means: 改善，改进，提高( improve的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The extra money could be spent on improving public transport.
sentence.Network_cn: 多余的资金可以用于改善公共交通系统。

sentence.Network_en: Lemon juice can help to prevent economy-class syndrome by improving blood circulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 柠檬汁能够改善血液循环，有助于预防经济舱综合征。

sentence.Network_en: Privatisation and gimmickry are not the answer to improving Britain's rail service.
sentence.Network_cn: 私有化和那些哗众取宠的做法并不能改进英国铁路运输。

PerfectNetExp.abs: improvidence 无远见；不节约improving 改进；精炼improvised installation 临时设施
improving research work at local normal colleges and universities ., 搞好地方高师院校的科研工作.
study on improving the history taking and estimation level of standardized patient ., 试论如何提高标准化病人的问诊评估水平.

entry.def: If something improves or if you improve it, it gets better.

example.ex: Both the texture and condition of your hair should improve...
example.tran: 你头发的发质与健康状况都应改善。

example.ex: The weather is beginning to improve...

entry.def: If a skill you have improves or you improve a skill, you get better at it.

example.ex: He said he was going to improve his football.
example.tran: 他说他要提高足球技术。

entry.def: If you improve after an illness or an injury, your health gets better or you get stronger.

example.ex: He had improved so much the doctor had cut his dosage.
example.tran: 他康复很快,医生已减少了用药剂量。

entry.def: If you improve on a previous achievement of your own or of someone else, you achieve a better standard or result.

example.ex: We need to improve on our performance against France.
example.tran: 我们需要比对阵法国队时表现得更好。

auth_sentence.content: We're still not quick but we are improving.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're still not quick but we are improving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're still not quick but we are improving.

auth_sentence.content: The IPO market is showing signs of improving health.
auth_sentence.res_content: The IPO market is showing signs of improving health.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The IPO market is showing signs of improving health.

auth_sentence.content: He said he did not see the situation improving.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said he did not see the situation improving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said he did not see the situation improving.

Sentence.sentence: In general, it's very good and improving.
Along with improving the equipment, Chris began a program to train employees to use equipment better and do simple maintenance themselves.
He is interested in improving his editing skills
